nodes.text: A bunker on the planet Talus was used as a hideout for the Sif faction, a mercenary group under the command of Human female Erran Sif, during the Galactic Civil War.

After the Battle of Yavin, the former Imperial spy Erran Sif was wanted by both the Empire and the Rebel Alliance for selling  information to the Hutts. She had thus fled from Corellia to Talus where she assembled  a band of mercenaries. Erran Sif eventually established her mercenary group, including two brothers Hirsch and Doak Sif, in the bunker.
Circa 1 ABY, Imperial Lieutenant Velso dispatched a spacer to the Sif bunker in order to retrieve the ship destruct sequence codes of a Rebel Corellian Corvette.
The same year, a spacer infiltrated the bunker and stole a lance.
